title: Online Social Studies Vocabulary Education Program Based on Computer-Assisted Vocabulary Acquisition (CAVA)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and foundational knowledge in elementary education
context.additional_context: Digital tool training for in-service elementary teachers to efficiently teach social studies vocabulary

learning_goals: Learners can acquire 500 core vocabulary items for social studies with 80% or higher accuracy using CAVA software
Learners can explain the application process of the ADDIE model in designing vocabulary learning activities in digital environments
Learners can submit a vocabulary instruction lesson design plan utilizing the CAVA tool through project-based assessment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
